verses.verse: In the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, <S%H6242><s%> in the twenty - first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> the Word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came by <S%H3027><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Speak <S%H559><s%> now to Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel, <S%H7597><s%> governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehozadak, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> and to the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

<S%H7604><s%> 'Who is left among you who saw <S%H7200><s%> this house <S%H1004><s%> in its former <S%H7223><s%> glory? <S%H3519><s%> How do you see <S%H7200><s%> it now? <S%H5869><s%> Isn't it in your eyes as nothing? <S%H3644><s%>

Yet now be strong, <S%H2388><s%> Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%>' says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> <S%H2388><s%> 'Be strong, Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehozadak, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest. <S%H3548><s%> Be strong, <S%H2388><s%> all you people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%>' says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> <S%H6213><s%> 'and work, for I am with you, <S%H5002><s%>' says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

This is the word <S%H1697><s%> that I covenanted <S%H3772><s%> with you when you came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and my Spirit <S%H7307><s%> lived <S%H5975><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you. <S%H3372><s%> 'Don't be afraid.'

For this is what Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> says: <S%H559><s%> <S%H259><s%> 'Yet once, it is a little while, <S%H4592><s%> and I will shake <S%H7493><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the dry land; <S%H2724><s%>

and I will shake <S%H7493><s%> all nations. <S%H1471><s%> The precious things of all nations <S%H1471><s%> will come, <S%H935><s%> and I will fill <S%H4390><s%> this house <S%H1004><s%> with glory, <S%H3519><s%> says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>
The silver <S%H3701><s%> is mine, <S%H2091><s%> and the gold is mine, <S%H5002><s%>' says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>

<S%H314><s%> 'The latter glory <S%H3519><s%> of this house <S%H1004><s%> will be greater than <S%H1419><s%> the former, <S%H7223><s%>' says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies; <S%H6635><s%> <S%H4725><s%> 'and in this place will I give <S%H5414><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%>' says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>"

In the twenty <S%H6242><s%> - fourth <S%H702><s%> day of the ninth <S%H8671><s%> month, <S%H8147><s%> in the second year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius, <S%H1867><s%> the Word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came by <S%H3027><s%> Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Thus says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies: <S%H6635><s%> Ask <S%H7592><s%> now the priests <S%H3548><s%> concerning the law, <S%H8451><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

<S%H376><s%> 'If someone carries <S%H5375><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> meat <S%H1320><s%> in the fold <S%H3671><s%> of his garment, <S%H899><s%> and with his fold <S%H3671><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> stew, <S%H5138><s%> wine, <S%H3196><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> or any food, <S%H3978><s%> will it become holy? <S%H6942><s%>'" The priests <S%H3548><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> "No."

Then Haggai <S%H2292><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "If one who is unclean <S%H2931><s%> by reason of a dead body <S%H5315><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> any of these, <S%H2930><s%> will it be unclean?" The priests <S%H3548><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> "It will be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>"

Then Haggai <S%H2292><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> <S%H5971><s%>"'So is this people, and so is this nation <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, <S%H5002><s%>' says Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> <S%H4639><s%> 'and so is every work of their hands. <S%H3027><s%> That which they offer <S%H7126><s%> there is unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

Now, <S%H7760><s%> please consider from this day <S%H3117><s%> and backward, <S%H4605><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> a stone <S%H68><s%> was laid <S%H7760><s%> on a stone <S%H68><s%> in the temple <S%H1964><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Through all that time, <S%H935><s%> when one came to a heap <S%H6194><s%> of twenty <S%H6242><s%> measures, <S%H6235><s%> there were only ten. When one came <S%H935><s%> to the wine vat <S%H3342><s%> to draw out <S%H2834><s%> fifty, <S%H2572><s%> there <S%H6333><s%> were only twenty. <S%H6242><s%>

I struck <S%H5221><s%> you with blight, <S%H7711><s%> mildew, <S%H3420><s%> and hail <S%H1259><s%> in all the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands; <S%H3027><s%> yet you didn't <S%H5002><s%> turn to me,' says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H7760><s%> 'Consider, please, <S%H3117><s%> from this day and backward, <S%H4605><s%> from the twenty <S%H6242><s%> - fourth <S%H702><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the ninth <S%H8671><s%> month, <S%H3117><s%> since the day that the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s temple <S%H1964><s%> was laid, <S%H7760><s%> consider it.

Is the seed <S%H2233><s%> yet in the barn? <S%H4035><s%> Yes, <S%H1612><s%> the vine, the fig tree, <S%H8384><s%> the pomegranate, <S%H7416><s%> and the olive <S%H2132><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> haven't <S%H5375><s%> brought forth. From this day <S%H3117><s%> will I bless you. <S%H1288><s%>'"

The Word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came the second <S%H8145><s%> time to Haggai <S%H2292><s%> in the twenty <S%H6242><s%> - fourth <S%H702><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Speak <S%H559><s%> to Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7493><s%> 'I will shake the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth. <S%H776><s%>

I will overthrow <S%H2015><s%> the throne <S%H3678><s%> of kingdoms. <S%H4467><s%> I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> the strength <S%H2392><s%> of the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the nations. <S%H1471><s%> I will overthrow <S%H2015><s%> the chariots, <S%H4818><s%> and those who ride <S%H7392><s%> in them. <S%H5483><s%> The horses and their riders <S%H7392><s%> will come down, <S%H3381><s%> everyone <S%H376><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> of his brother. <S%H251><s%>

In that day, <S%H3117><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> will I take <S%H3947><s%> you, <S%H2216><s%> Zerubbabel, my servant, <S%H5650><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel, <S%H7597><s%>' says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> <S%H7760><s%> 'and will make you as a signet, <S%H2368><s%> for I have chosen <S%H977><s%> you, <S%H5002><s%>' says Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies. <S%H6635><s%>"
